name: mandiant-threat-intel
label: Mandiant Threat Intelligence
description: Mandiant Threat Intelligence provides automated access to indicators of compromise (IOCs) â€” IP addresses, domain names, URLs threat actors are using, via the indicators, allows access to full length finished intelligence in the reports, allows for notificaiton of threats to brand and keyword monitoring via the alerts, and finally allows searching for intelligence on the adversary with the search. This connector facilitates automated operations such as indicators, reports, alerts, and search collections.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Public Key
fields.name: public_key
fields.description: The unique Mandiant Threat Intelligence Public Key used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Threat Intelligence API.

fields.title: Private Key
fields.name: private_key
fields.description: The unique Mandiant Threat Intelligence Private Key used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Threat Intelligence API.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves all indicators or specific indicators from Mandiant Threat Intelligence based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Indicators

parameters.title: Created At
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.description: Specify the DateTime when the indicators were created in Mandiant Threat Intelligence, and from when you want to retrieve indicators from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation. The maximum number of results per page is set to 50 items.

parameters.title: STIX UUID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the STIX ID of the alert object based on which you want to retrieve indicators from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Select the status of the indicator based on which you want to filter the indicators retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can choose between Active or Revoked.

operations.description: Retrieves all reports or specific reports for threat actors from Mandiant Threat Intelligence based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Reports

parameters.title: Created At
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.description: Specify the DateTime when the indicators were created in Mandiant Threat Intelligence, and from when you want to retrieve indicators from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation. The maximum number of results per page is set to 50 items.

parameters.title: Report ID
parameters.name: report_id
parameters.description: Specify the STIX ID of the report object based on which you want to retrieve reports from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the STIX ID of the report object based on which you want to retrieve reports from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.

parameters.title: Document ID
parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: Specify the Report ID to filter this operation to retrieve details of the specific report from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Report ID to filter this operation to retrieve details of the specific report from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Select the status of the report based on which you want to filter the reports retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can choose between Active or Revoked.

parameters.title: Subscription
parameters.name: subscription
parameters.description: Select the subscription of the report based on which you want to filter the reports retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: Cyber-Crime, Cyber-Espionage, Hacktivism, Cyber-Physical, Strategic, Fusion, Operational, Vulnerability, or Standard.

parameters.title: Report Type
parameters.name: report_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of report based on which you want to filter the reports retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.

parameters.title: Actor Name
parameters.name: actor_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the actor based on which you want to filter the reports retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. This parameter filters the report results down to a specific actor and returns all matching reports for that actor.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the actor based on which you want to filter the reports retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. This parameter filters the report results down to a specific actor and returns all matching reports for that actor.

parameters.title: Malware Name
parameters.name: malware_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the malware based on which you want to filter the reports retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. This parameter filters the report results down to a specific malware family and returns all matching reports for that malware family.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the malware based on which you want to filter the reports retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. This parameter filters the report results down to a specific malware family and returns all matching reports for that malware family.

operations.description: Retrieves all alerts or specific alerts from Mandiant Threat Intelligence based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Alerts

parameters.title: Created At
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.description: Specify the DateTime when the alerts were created in Mandiant Threat Intelligence, and from when you want to retrieve alerts from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Specify the number of results, per page, that you want to include in the response of this operation. The maximum number of results per page is set to 50 items.

parameters.title: ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the STIX ID of the alert object based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the STIX ID of the alert object based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Mandiant Threat Intelligence.

parameters.title: Alert Type
parameters.name: alert_type
parameters.description: Select the type of alerts based on which you want to filter the alerts retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: Forum_Post, Tweet, Web_Content_Publish, Paste, Email_Analysis, Domain_Discovery, or Document_Analysis.

parameters.title: Alert Status
parameters.name: alert_status
parameters.description: Select the status of alerts based on which you want to filter the alerts retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: New, New_Requested, Investigated, Under_Investigation, Closed, or Closed_Investigated.

parameters.title: Alert Categories
parameters.name: alert_categories
parameters.description: Select the category of alerts based on which you want to filter the alerts retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: Social-Media, Forums, Documents, Malware-Repository, Network-Indicators, Web-Content, or Paste-Sites.

parameters.title: Alert Severity
parameters.name: alert_severity
parameters.description: Select the severity of alerts based on which you want to filter the alerts retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: Low, Medium, High, or Critical.

operations.description: Retrieves all collections or specific collections from Mandiant Threat Intelligence based on the input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Search Collections

parameters.title: Queries
parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Specify the queries using which you want to retrieve the list of Query Objects from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. Each query object includes its type and properties.

parameters.title: Include Connected Objects
parameters.name: include_connected_objects
parameters.description: Select this option to include objects connected to matching objects, through a reference or relationship, in the search response.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to include objects connected to matching objects, through a reference or relationship, in the search response.

parameters.title: Connected Objects
parameters.name: connected_objects
parameters.description: Specify the list of all connections using which you want to retrieve connected objects from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. Connections contain fields such as, connection_type, connected_type, object_type, property, or relationship_type.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of all connections using which you want to retrieve connected objects from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. Connections contain fields such as, connection_type, connected_type, object_type, property, or relationship_type.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Specify the property of the object using which you want to sort results retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. 
Note: Sort By is applicable only when the include_connected_object flag is set to false.
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the property of the object using which you want to sort results retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. 
Note: Sort By is applicable only when the include_connected_object flag is set to false.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description:
Specify the sort direction of the results retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can set the sort order to "asc" (ascending) or "desc" (descending). If the sort order is not specified, it defaults to ascending.
Note: Sort Order is applicable only when the include_connected_object flag is set to false.
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the sort direction of the results retrieved from Mandiant Threat Intelligence. You can set the sort order to "asc" (ascending) or "desc" (descending). If the sort order is not specified, it defaults to ascending.
Note: Sort Order is applicable only when the include_connected_object flag is set to false.
